comments.body:
I think you could rephrase this. It's not immediately clear to me reading this how to actually configure this integration.

I would suggest explicitely naming the actual configuration properties to be filled (`sentry_dsn`) in `airflow.cfg`, and adding an example DSN with dummy values.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@   pip install 'apache-airflow[sentry]'

Add your ``SENTRY_DSN`` to your configuration file e.g. ``airflow.cfg`` under ``[sentry]``. Its template resembles the following: ``'{PROTOCOL}://{PUBLIC_KEY}@{HOST}/{PROJECT_ID}'``

.. code-block:: ini
